createExcelFile() - Method in class metricas.Maestro
Creates all the objects necessary to create a xlsx file and calls the methods createHeaderExcel(XSSFSheet sheet) and exportResults(XSSFSheet sheet) that will fill the sheet object with all the metric analysis.
createHeaderExcel(XSSFSheet) - Method in class metricas.Maestro
Adds to the sheet object the header of the future xlsx file, containing the cells "MethodID", "Package", "Class", "Method" and all the metric and rule names.

cutAbsolutePath(String) - Method in class metricas.Maestro
Does String manipulation to turn the full path of a file to just the package and class separated by a forward slash (/). e.g. pkg/cls
CYCLO_method - Class in metricas
CYCLO_method is a type of Metrica that increments its counter everytime it finds certain words in the code inside of a method, evaluating the cyclomatic complexity of the method
